Entry.JapaneseText: ……あの娘、命からがらといった感じの ずいぶんひどい身なりをしていたな。
Entry.EnglishText: Judging by the deplorable state she was in, that girl must have been fighting for her life.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>、そんなコト言ったら、 また<Veigue>を不安にさせちゃうでしょ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...<Eugene>, if you go on saying stuff like that, you're going to make <Veigue> anxious again.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや……あの娘ならクレアの事を、 何か知っているかもしれない……
Entry.EnglishText: No... She might know something about Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、探し出して、 話を聞こう。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, let's go searching for her so we can ask her.
